# The `RebasedConstantInfo` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

This represents a constant that has been rebased with respect to a base constant.

The difference to the base constant is recorded in Offset.

Definition at line 103 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/constanthoisting-h">ConstantHoisting.h</a>.
